title: Planar region with log function part - c

content.description: In the figure above, R is the shaded region in the first quadrant bounded by the graph of y=4ln(3-x), the horizontal line y=6, and the vertical line x=2.
content.question: The region R is the base of a solid. For this solid, each cross section perpendicular to the x-axis is a square. Find the volume of the solid.

frqParts.text: The region R is the base of a solid. For this solid, each cross section perpendicular to the x-axis is a square. Find the volume of the solid.

topic.text: 8.7: Volumes with Cross Sections - Squares and Rectangles

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
